author: Anthony Guillen
comment: Works perfectly. Literally a life saver. As with many business people, I inevitably wind up having to get on conference calls while driving. Even when call organizers include the "mobile-friendly" dialer in invites, you often have to hunt around the invite to find it, and often my phone doesn't identify it for one tap dialing, especially from the Outlook app. Very dangerous to deal with while driving. This app does a great job of finding conference call details from invites, and I no longer have to miss these calls while driving. And even when not driving, i rely on this app because our bridge system uses 7 digit codes which are hard to remember. Invaluable.

author: Venkat Devu
comment: I tried to conference call but greeted by 'Cannot find a call' msg. All it uses is the system setting. It did nothing to make a conference. Waste of space for me as I still didn't get a conference call feature.

reply.author: Acorn Studio
reply.content: Thank you for your comment. Please check the website http://bit.ly/conferencecalling that describes how conference call dialer works . I hope it will answer all the doubts you may have :)

title: Useless app for Lenovo a7000-a

author: Eric Bischof
comment: The interface is a little clunky but it worked fine for me. Most importantly, it got the correct dialing string to enter my participant and leader codes! I'm happy..
title: Works fine

author: Rob Orlando
comment: It works OK, but can't give it a higher rating as it doesn't always  pick up the correct numbers.  In that case, there is a feature to allow you to manually chose so it can dial correctly.

author: Marc Gamet
comment: It just needs some help getting the rules to work better at helping to auto detect the phone number and conference codes in my meeting events. I've tried to teach it by making rules, but not a lot of luck there. I still recommend the app though!
title: Very helpful dialer, especially for calling in to meeting while driving

author: Merill Fernando
comment: The biggest problem with all of the apps that I've tried is that none of them picked the number from the location field. This is the only app that picked it. Unfortunately that's as far as I got. It doesn't let me dial into meetings that don't have a conference code.  There isn't even an option to disable this required field check.
title: Conference code is required

author: mike talbot
comment: Usually pretty good about pulling dial info from calendar, but sometimes I have to manually select data. Also, this app doesn't support GoogleVoice (Google's fault), just an FYI.
title: Mostly great!

author: Ted Kunich
comment: Used this on previous versions of Android but app does not send codes when running on Nougat so is effectively useless.
title: Does not work on Nougat

author: Juan Jose Ramirez
comment: Hi, i am unable to import config to a new phone using either manual import or the gmail code. you server dns seems down.

author: Donny Davis
comment: My plain Jane Motorola force can't do this on its own. Thanks for the solution
title: Dials like a boss

author: Jack Fewx
comment: Picks up most of the conference call numbers from my appointments, the rest needed me to update the list of search terms, but after that each meeting is a one touch dial.
title: Works well

author: Shawn Anderson
comment: Love the app,  just needs a bit more work on parsing out phone numbers.   Also it would be great to be able to save profiles based on conference systems or domain names.
title: Good app,  just needs a little more work

author: Ranganatha Gr
comment: Not able to make conference call at all, i used both leader pin and participant pin.

reply.author: Acorn Studio
reply.content: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. On the following website http://bit.ly/conferencecalling you will find information how to use the app. In case of any additional questions please send me an email to acornstudiodev@gmail.com :)

author: Jeffrey Bozeman
comment: Works well with WebEx and similar calling systems with ways to be a host or participating using the same number.  Had to Uninstall and Install after the Android 6.0.1 update and it still works great.
title: Had to reinstall after the 6.0.1 update

comment: It works perfectly after a bit of customization. It really improved my life when having to join a lot of conference calls from the car. Thanks!!!

author: Ben D
comment: Stopped working with Nougat. Conf bridge says invalid code.

author: Rahul M
comment: Joining conference calls on go was a challenge but that's not the case now!!!
title: Excellent app

comment: Picking up dial-in numbers and codes from a calendar invite is no easy task. This is one more app that promises to do it and doesn't.

comment: Makes life so much easier when it detects the gateways,  codes and with the widget, makes it a one touch affair to join any conference
title: Brilliant app

comment: Used to work fine, now it no longer dials the conference code. It recognizes it, displays it, but does not dial it.
